value.0:
[This summons has been personally addressed to you, requesting that you come to the Isle of Zhantara, where Overlord Vhorkas, a high ranking official of the Sharakhan Empire, wishes to discuss a matter of "great importance".]

The text of the summons reads:

- Faithful servant of Almighty Emperor Rakha and the magnificence of the Empire of Sharakha,

I, Vhorkas, Overlord of the Imperial Fortress of Zhantara, issue this summons for you to join me on the Isle of Zhantara.  The Sharakhan Empire has taken note of both you and your abilities, and we wish to speak with you further regarding a proposition which will benefit both yourself and the Imperial cause.

It is your duty as a faithful charge of the Sharakhan Empire to answer this summons in a timely fashion.  We have made arrangements for you to take board one of our ships, the Voyager, at the port of Bhaksra.  

Upon your arrival, we shall speak further.  I look forward to meeting you in person quite soon, and shall be awaiting your prompt arrival.

- Vhorkas
  Overlord of Zhantara
